description:
A peaked hat with complete sun and wind protection. The cape provides full coverage for the neck, while the stiffened brim shades the face from the sun and screens the wind. Lightweight fabric keeps you cool, dries quickly, and crushes easily so you can cram it into a pack.

  • Made of 100% nylon with UPF 30+ protection
  • The moisture managing headband provides day long comfort
  • Elasticized sun skirt with adjustable hook-and-loop closure allows you to customize your fit
name: Outdoor Research Sun Runner Cap - Infants to Youths
